specifications.Finish: Chemical > Reflective Reflective fabric is treated with tiny glass beads or reflective materials that reflect light. This enhances visibility and safety in low-light conditions, making it suitable for activewear, outdoor gear, and safety garments.
specifications.Care Advice: Chemical > Reflective This fabric is delicate and susceptible to damage from rubbing or impact. Please handle it with care.
specifications.Care Instructions: Do not wash / Spot clean only Recommended Use Lining
